A sermon preached at the funerall of M. Christopher Love, in St. Laurence church, August, 25. 1651. By Thomas Manton, minister of the gospell at Stoak-Newington near London. Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
[4], 12 p.
Printed by J.B., London : 1651.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Septemb: 8". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
